metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7655 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Eclipse Mosquitto version from 1.0 to 1.4.15, a Null Dereference vulnerability was found in the Mosquitto library which could lead to crashes for those applications using the library. It was discovered that Mosquitto incorrectly handled certain inputs. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: mosquitto package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.5-1.1').
